title: Patient-Engaged Nursing Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Skills and Patient Care Experience
context.additional_context: A blended course for practicing nurses, learning through VR simulations and real-case sharing of patients' subjective experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate the application of at least three empathetic communication skills through interactions with service users role-playing as patients in VR simulations.
Learners can analyze real-life experience cases provided by service users to develop two patient-centered nursing care plans.
Through reflective journaling, learners can describe in three or more items how patient engagement learning has impacted their nursing practice.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
